headlines: Bitcoin to hit new all-time high within 6 months: Grayscale
US crypto market structure legislation to advance in early 2026
Trump to 'look into' recently convicted Samurai Wallet co-founder
events: US crypto market structure legislation expected in early 2026 (regulatory progress)
Grayscale's prediction of Bitcoin reaching a new all-time high within 6 months (institutional sentiment)
articles.summary: The top headlines indicate strong bullish momentum, with institutional confidence (Grayscale) predicting a new Bitcoin ATH and regulatory clarity on the horizon in the US. The mention of political figures engaging with crypto adds attention to adoption narratives. These factors combined suggest a high-impact, bullish environment for BTC.

headlines: Bitcoin Sinks Towards $85,000 as Ethereum, XRP Fall Alongside
Ripple Expanding RLUSD From XRP Ledger and Ethereum
Bank of America's Analysts Signal Regulatory Shift Towards On-Chain Assets
events: Regulatory shift towards on-chain assets by Bank of America analysts
Ripple expanding RLUSD across XRP Ledger and Ethereum (adoption signal)
articles.summary: Bitcoin is trading near $85,000 amid a broader crypto sell-off, with Ethereum and XRP also declining. Ripple's expansion of RLUSD signals institutional adoption, but the dominant trend is bearish due to market-wide weakness and potential regulatory caution. Bank of Americaâ€™s analysts indicate growing interest in on-chain assets, which could support longer-term bullish sentiment, but immediate pressure remains from macro and price action.
